message.name: ERR_ADD_BOOKMARK_TO_CLOSED_CASE
message.locale: This case was not added to My Items Of Interest as it has a status of closed.

message.name: ERR_ADD_BOOKMARK_ALREADY_BOOKMARKED_CASE
message.locale: This case was not added to My Items Of Interest as it is already included in your list of Items Of Interest.

message.name: ERR_DELETE_BOOKMARK_CASE_NOT_BOOKMARKED
message.locale: This case was not removed from My Items Of Interest as this case is not included on your list of Items Of Interest.
